code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function IntervalRow(_ref){let{prefix,interval,nextInterval}=_ref;const[expanded,setExpanded]=useState(false);const expandList=()=>{setExpanded(e=>!e);};const generateCodes=(from,to)=>{const[_,numA]=from.split("-");const[__,numB]=to.split("-");const a=parseInt(numA,10);const b=parseInt(numB,10);const codes=[];for(let i=a;i<=b;i++){codes.push(`${prefix}-${String(i).padStart(4,"0")}`);}return codes;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{border:"1px solid #ccc",padding:8,marginBottom:8,display:"flex",alignItems:"center",gap:12,justifyContent:"space-between"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:prefix})," dispon\xEDveis: ",interval.from," at\xE9 ",interval.to]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex",gap:8},children:[nextInterval.from&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>alert(`Próximo: ${nextInterval.from} até ${nextInterval.to}`),children:"Pr\xF3ximo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:expandList,children:expanded?"Ocultar códigos":"Expandir"})]}),expanded&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:8,width:"100%"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{readOnly:true,style:{width:"100%",height:100},value:generateCodes(interval.from,interval.to).join("\n")})})]});}
